definition: Chen Xiangmei (1925-2018), a.k.a. Anna Chennault, born in Beijing, US Republican Party politician, wife of Claire Lee Chennault 陳納德|陈纳德[Chen2 na4 de2]
surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: After his death, Anna settled in the U. S. with their two children.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫去世之後，陳香梅帶着兩個孩子在美國定居。

sentences.english: She was one of initiators of "Teachers' Day" in China.
sentences.chinese: 陳香梅女士是中國教師節的發起人之一。
